sys_script_include.name: TotalPrice

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f4bb317397bc111026dadb24a253af7b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_843001_final_app.TotalPrice</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TotalPrice</name><script><![CDATA[var TotalPrice = Class.create();
TotalPrice.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    Price: function() {
        var productsArray = current.u_related_order_lines;
        var arr = this.getParameter('sysparm_productsArray');
		var products = arr.split(',');
		var total = 0;
		for(var i = 0; i <= orders.length; i++) {
			var bT = new GlideRecord('u_product_order');
			bT.addQuery('sys_id', products[i]);
			bT.query();
			while (bT.next()) {
				total += parseInt(bT.u_price);
			}
		}
    },
    type: 'TotalPrice'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-26 23:26:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>f4bb317397bc111026dadb24a253af7b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TotalPrice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Final Application" source="x_843001_final_app">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Final Application">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f4bb317397bc111026dadb24a253af7b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-26 23:49:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
